behavioral_safety.prompt_template: Research evidence-based behavioral safety practices for: {topic}. Focus on quantifiable outcomes, implementation strategies, and ROI metrics. Include recent studies (2023-2025).

leadership_safety.prompt_template: Analyze safety leadership research for: {topic}. Emphasize transformational leadership, engagement metrics, and organizational culture impact.

communication_safety.prompt_template: Examine safety communication research on: {topic}. Focus on effectiveness metrics, feedback mechanisms, and incident reporting improvements.
